LanguageData.BGPScanner_DivideByCommonality: Divide search time by thing's deep commonality
LanguageData.BGPScanner_DivideByCommonalityDesc: The more common the thing is, the quicker it will be to find. This only applies when choosing a specific output. It is applied after the chosen output multiplier.
LanguageData.BGPScanner_AllowUnderRoof: Allow to build the ground-penetrating scanner under a roof
LanguageData.BGPScanner_AutoDsc: When no pawns are using the ground-penetrating scanner, it will continue to scan at the specified efficiency below.
LanguageData.BGPScanner_AutoFind: Automatic mode has found a lump of buried {0} using the ground-penetrating scanner!
